level.heading: Interstate and intrastate privileges.
level.text: Rental fleets and utility trailers, owned by any person or firm engaging in the business of renting such vehicle, shall be extended full interstate and intrastate privileges, provided the following:
Such vehicle or trailers are part of a rental fleet and are identifiable as being a part of such fleet; and
Such person or firm registers a portion of said vehicles or trailers as provided in § 50-1505.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-157
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-157, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1505.04.
